subject: p15114531
Findings: In comparison with study of, there is little change and no evidence of acute cardiopulmonary disease. The heart is normal in size, and there is no acute pneumonia, vascular congestion, or pleural effusion. The right PICC line has been removed and the cervical fusion is again seen.
